H0.text: what language does australia use. Australian Aboriginal Language

H1.text: what language does australia use. Maori

H2.text: what language does australia use. Mandarin Chinese

H3.text: what language does australia use. English Language

A4.text: Australian English has developed as the first language of the vast majority of the inhabitants of the Australian continent, its standard accent being General Australian.

A5.text: In the United Kingdom, the United States, Australia, and New Zealand, it is the dominant language for historical reasons without being explicitly defined by law.
